full_text:
Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 751 Filed 08/10/22 Page 186 of 261 1347
LC6Cmax5 McHugh - cross
1 and 1064. Do you see those checks?
2 A. I do.
3 Q. If you're looking at 1063, do you see that check is made out to the United States Treasury; correct?
4 A. Yes.
5 Q. And that says in the middle line, 2007 form 1040; correct?
6 A. Yes.
7 Q. So that's a check to pay for estimated taxes, isn't it?
8 A. I assume.
9 Q. So that check shows that Harry Beller is signing a check to pay Ghislaine Maxwell's taxes for that year, doesn't it?
10 A. I don't know, but that's what that appears to be.
11 Q. And the check below, similar, goes to the New York State Income Tax Authority; isn't that right?
12 A. Yes.
13 Q. So it would appear from that check that Harry Beller is signing a check on an account held by Ghislaine Maxwell to pay Ghislaine Maxwell state taxes that year; isn't that right?
14 MS. MOE: Objection, your Honor.
15 THE COURT: Sustained. How much longer with this witness, Mr. Everdell?
16 MR. EVERDELL: Just one moment, your Honor, I'll be able to tell you in a second.
17 THE COURT: Okay.
18 BY MR. EVERDELL:
19 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300
DOJ-OGR-00018523
